title: Crypto.com Launches Prediction Market Platform in US
snippet: Crypto.com on Tuesday (Feb. 3) announced the launch of OG, a new prediction market platform that lets users trade contracts tied to the outcomes of real-world events. The platform is powered by Crypto.com Derivatives North America (CDNA), a Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC)-registered exch

title: Rails taps Stellar to launch onchain vaults for institutional derivatives liquidity
snippet: Rails is betting that Stellar‑based smart contract vaults, onchain proofs and segregated collateral can make high‑speed perpetuals more palatable to institutions.

title: Fireblocks integrates Canton Network for regulated onchain settlement
snippet: The integration allows institutions to custody and settle assets on the privacy-enabled blockchain built for regulated financial markets.

title: MetaMask integrates Ondo to offer 200+ tokenized U.S. stocks inside crypto wallet
MetaMask adds tokenized US stocks, ETFs, commodities via Ondo
snippet: The rollout provides access to tokenized US stocks, ETFs and commodities through Ondo GM tokens for non-US users on Ethereum, excluding 30 jurisdictions at launch.

title: Arizona Attorney General Issues Warning as Crypto ATM Scams Hit Older Adults
snippet: Arizona has launched a fraud reporting tool as crypto ATM scams surge and losses mount, especially among older consumers.

title: World Liberty launches $3.4B stablecoin: How it fits into onchain credit systems

title: Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital posts $482 million loss as cash pile swells
snippet: Thanks to equity raises, the company grew its cash and stablecoins reserves by 36% when compared to the previous quarter.

title: Y Combinator opens stablecoin funding option for startups starting Spring 2026
snippet: YC's Nemil Dalal told The Block that funding will be in USDC across major blockchain networks, including Ethereum, Base, and Solana.

title: Sumsub achieves travel rule compliance for digital assets with Fireblocks
snippet: Sumsub, a global full-cycle compliance and fraud prevention platform, today announced its partnership with Fireblocks, an enterprise platform providing digital asset infrastructure solutions to businesses building on blockchain, to deliver seamless and secure Travel Rule compliance.

title: Avalanche Policy Coalition unveils advisory council, calls for ‘global energy’ as crypto rules across the world take shape

title: Taurus selects Capco as implementation partner in Europe
snippet: Taurus SA, a leader in enterprise-grade digital asset infrastructure, today announced a strategic partnership with global management and technology consultancy Capco, a Wipro company.

title: Spanish Red Cross launches privacy-first blockchain aid platform
snippet: The Spanish Red Cross is rolling out RedChain, a privacy-preserving blockchain aid system that gives donors cryptographic proof of impact without exposing beneficiary identities.

title: Stripe’s Stablecoin Expansion Faces Sanctions Scrutiny

title: Non-custodial crypto wallet Safe reports fivefold revenue jump in 2025, not yet at ‘break-even’ profitability
snippet: The non-profit Safe foundation said the project is “not yet profitable,” though the team hopes to "break-even and double revenue in 2026."
